Name: Harish Narasappa
Bio: Harish is a designated senior advocate. He was the founding partner of the law firm, Samvad Partners, headquartered in Bengaluru. Harish appears regularly before various courts and tribunals in India on a variety of matters.

Name: Raja Karthikeya
Bio: Raja Karthikeya is an international security researcher and a United Nations officer. Previously, he was a visiting Research Fellow at the University of Oxford.

Name: Ambassador Ranjan Mathai
Bio: A distinguished Indian Foreign Service officer from the 1974 batch, he served as Foreign Secretary of India and later as India's High Commissioner to the UK. Over his career, he held key diplomatic positions, including Ambassador to France, Israel, and Qatar, and Deputy High Commissioner to the UK

Name: Vasanthi Hariprakash
Bio: Vasanthi is an award-winning journalist, sought-after speaker, radio and television personality and media entrepreneur. She is the founder of Pickle Jar Media, which helps brands, startups and non-profits tell their stories via podcasts and curated events.

Name: Neena Gopal
Bio: Neena Gopal began her career in journalism over 30 years ago in Bangalore, which was then a hotbed of post-emergency politics. She moved to the UAE in the 1980s, where she worked for the Dubai-based “Daily Gulf News” as a foreign editor.

Name: Colonel (Dr) John Prince
Bio: He is an Army veteran excelling in team building and strategic management. Quality control specialist with 6 Sigma expertise at DGQA. GIS instructor and school executive, now leading IT Systems and Cyber Security at a premier training institute.

Name: Pratap Heblikar
Bio: He is a national security expert with a 38-year GoI career, retiring as Special Secretary. The founder of CNSS, he leads ICSB. Academic advisor at premier universities. Heads Maxgrid Securicor, actively advancing strategic dialogue and inspiring India's youth on national security.

Name: V Ravichandar
Bio: He is the Chairman of Feedback Consulting, a leading research and consulting firm in India that has been part of over US$ 6 bn investments in India. He is the Honorary Consul, Republic of Slovenia in Karnataka.

Name: Lt General Karanbir Singh Brar (Retd.)
Bio: Lt Gen Brar brings four decades of military expertise across terrains and UN missions. As DG Armoured Corps, he pioneered Light Tanks and Drones. He advises on AI and mentors technologies while pursuing his doctorate.

Name: Ashok Venkateshmurthy
Bio: Partner at Factum Law and Allied Law Practices

Name: Naganand Doraswamy
Bio: Naganand is the Managing Partner and Founder at Ideaspring Capital, actively shaping the firm's strategy and guiding its portfolio companies to success. He brings a wealth of experience as Co-Founder and EVP at SPAN Infotech India Pvt Ltd, and as Co-Founder of Lexar Networks.
